Name: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' occurrences across all cases
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' activities

Name: Percentage of process variants that include 'Accepted + Wait - Customer'
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' appearing immediately after 'Accepted + In Progress'
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' activities

Name: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' that are followed by 'Completed + Resolved'
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' out of all 'Completed + Resolved'

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' compared to the frequency of 'Accepted + Wait - User'
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' activities

Name: Percentage of total cases containing 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' relative to cases containing 'Completed + In Call'
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' out of all 'Completed + In Call'

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' in variants that eventually lead to 'Completed + Closed'
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' activities for cases where activity 'Completed + Closed' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' occurrences in cases that also contain 'Completed + In Call'
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' out of all 'Completed + In Call'

Name: Percentage of variants where 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' appears before 'Completed + Resolved'
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' out of all 'Completed + Resolved'

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' relative to the most frequent activity 'Accepted + In Progress'
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' activities

Name: Percentage of cases with 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' that do not include any 'Completed + In Call' activity
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' out of all cases where 'Completed + In Call' does not happen

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' grouped by country of execution
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' activities grouped by the last value of organization country

Name: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' among all 'Accepted + Wait' type activities (including 'Accepted + Wait', 'Accepted + Wait - User', 'Accepted + Wait - Implementation', 'Accepted + Wait - Vendor')
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of direct transitions from 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment' to 'Accepted + Wait - Customer'
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' activities

Name: Percentage of process instances where 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' occurs more than once
Metric: the average of the function base > 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Accepted + Wait - Customer'

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' in high-performance variants (performance < median variant duration)
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' activities

Name: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' events that occur in the same case as at least one 'Completed + In Call' event
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' out of all 'Completed + In Call'

Name: Ratio of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' to 'Completed + In Call' in terms of total occurrence counts
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' activities

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' per year based on timestamp data
